meanings.sent1: The band played the rhythmic beat on the tympanums.
meanings.sent2: She tapped the tympanums with her drumsticks to create music.
meanings.sent3: The tympanums in the music room seemed to have a mind of their own, playing tunes when no one was around.
meanings.sent4: The tympanums echoed through the forest, calling all creatures to dance.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the tympanums filled the air, making everyone want to move to the beat.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined her tympanums to check for any issues with her hearing.
meanings.sent2: Loud noises can sometimes damage the delicate tympanums in your ears.
meanings.sent3: His tympanums seemed to have a special power, allowing him to hear even the quietest whispers.
meanings.sent4: The music was so loud that it felt like his tympanums were about to burst.
meanings.sent5: She covered her tympanums to protect them from the booming sound of the fireworks.
